pillar.title: Systems, Infrastructure, Technology and Operations
pillar.definition: The non-human systems that make anesthesia possible: facilities, OR operations, workflows, IT, cybersecurity, anesthesia machines, monitors, supply chain, turnover processes, documentation systems.
inclusion_tests: Is this about how the environment, technology, or system functions so anesthesia care can occur?
exclusion_tests: Contracts, money flows, cultural issues, career advice, supervision laws.
